      • getContentMetadataAsString

        java.lang.String getContentMetadataAsString(java.io.File metadataFile)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes the content metadata file and loads its content in a string. It handles compression gzip, bzip2 or none using Tika to detect it based on the file header.
        Parameters:
        inode -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
